com.cmput301w20t10.uberapp.database.dao

Class DriverDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w20t10.uberapp.database.base.DAOBase<DriverEntity,Driver>
      • com.cmput301w20t10.uberapp.database.dao.DriverDAO

  • public class DriverDAO
extends DAOBase<DriverEntity,Driver>
    Data Access Object (DAO) for Driver model. DAO contains specific operations that are concerned with the model they are associated with.

public androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData<Driver> registerDriver(java.lang.String username,

                                                                           java.lang.String firstName,

        Registers a driver.
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        email -
        firstName -
        lastName -
        phoneNumber -
        image -
        owner -
        Returns:
        Returns a MutableLiveData object. To observe a MutableLiveData object: 
              DatabaseManager db = DatabaseManager.getInstance();
      DAO dao = db.getDAO();
      MutableLiveData liveData = dao.getModel(...);
      liveData.observe(this, model -> {
          // receive model inside here
      });
        When observed, the object may receive model as the following:
        • Non-null Driver object: the Driver object's fields were successfully added to the database.
          Null: Registration failed.

      • logInAsDriver

        public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Driver> logInAsDriver(java.lang.String username,
                                                         java.lang.String password,

        Attempts to log the user in as a driver.
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        owner -
        Returns:
        Returns a MutableLiveData object. To observe a MutableLiveData object: 
              DatabaseManager db = DatabaseManager.getInstance();
      DAO dao = db.getDAO();
      MutableLiveData liveData = dao.getModel(...);
      liveData.observe(this, model -> {
          // receive model inside here
      });
        When observed, the object may receive model as the following:
        • Non-null Driver object: Log in was successful.
          Null: Log in was unsuccessful.

      • saveModel

        public androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData<java.lang.Boolean> saveModel(Driver driver)
        Description copied from class: DAOBase
        Saves all dirty fields for a given model. Dirty fields in an entity are unsaved fields. DatabaseObjectBase detects these changes. This is the method that's encouraged to use to update your models. To update your models: 

             Rider rider;

     ...
     // code that changes your rider such as
     rider.setImage("new image");
     ...

     MutableLiveData liveData = RiderDAO.getDAO();
     liveData.observe(lifecycleOwner, riderDAO -> {
         if (riderDAO != null) {
              // it is recommended that you keep your riderDAO as a local variable
              // once you have verified that riderDAO is null
              riderDAO.saveModel(rider)
                  .observe(...);
         } else {
              // error handling here
              // it is likely that the user was not logged in
              // or the user was logged out by the system
         }
     });
        Specified by:
        saveModel in class DAOBase<DriverEntity,Driver>
        Parameters:
        driver -
        Returns:
        See Also:
        DAOBase.saveModel(ModelBase)

      • getCollectionName

        protected java.lang.String getCollectionName()
        Description copied from class: DAOBase
        Get Firestore Collection name associated with the DAO. This is used for a code in DAOBAse. On the subclass, simply put: 
             protected String getCollectionName() {
         return COLLECTION; // where COLLECTION is a static final String
     }
        Specified by:
        getCollectionName in class DAOBase<DriverEntity,Driver>
        Returns:
        COLLECTION String representing the collection name in Firestore
